title: Best of The Herd: 02/01/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 02/01/2019
description:
Colin warns people to slow down comparing Sean McVay to Bill Belichick after just two playoff victories.  He thinks the Patriots are a lot like the Beatles and this season is their "Abbey Road."  Plus, Rams legend and NFL Hall of Fame RB Eric Dickerson joins the show from Atlanta to talk about what the Rams need to do to upset the Patriots on Sunday.  Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
